net.opentsdb.tsd

类 RpcManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.opentsdb.tsd.RpcManager

  • public final class RpcManager
extends Object
    Manager for the lifecycle of HttpRpcs, TelnetRpcs, RpcPlugins, and HttpRpcPlugin. This is a singleton. Its lifecycle must be managed by the "container". If you are launching via TSDMain then shutdown (and non-lazy initialization) is taken care of. Outside of the use of TSDMain, you are responsible for shutdown, at least.

    Here's an example of how to correctly handle shutdown manually: 

     // Startup our TSDB instance...
 TSDB tsdb_instance = ...;

 // ... later, during shtudown ..

 if (RpcManager.isInitialized()) {
   // Check that its actually been initialized.  We don't want to
   // create a new instance only to shutdown!
   RpcManager.instance(tsdb_instance).shutdown().join();
 }
    从以下版本开始:
    2.2

    • 字段详细资料

      • PLUGIN_BASE_WEBPATH

        protected static final String PLUGIN_BASE_WEBPATH
        This is base path where HttpRpcPlugins are rooted. It's used to match incoming requests.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • instance

        public static RpcManager instance(TSDB tsdb)
        Get or create the singleton instance of the manager, loading all the plugins enabled in the given TSDB's Config.
        返回:
        the shared instance of RpcManager. It's okay to hold this reference once obtained.

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()
        返回:
        true if the shared instance has been initialized; false otherwise.

      • getRpcPlugins

        protected com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<RpcPlugin> getRpcPlugins()
        返回:
        list of loaded RpcPlugins. Possibly empty but never null.

      • initializeHttpRpcPlugins

        protected void initializeHttpRpcPlugins(TSDB.OperationMode mode,
                                        String[] pluginClassNames,
                                        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap.Builder<String,HttpRpcPlugin> http)
        Load and init the HttpRpcPlugins provided as an array of pluginClassNames.
        参数:
        mode - is this TSD in read/write ("rw") or read-only ("ro") mode?
        pluginClassNames - fully-qualified class names that are instances of HttpRpcPlugins
        http - a map of canonicalized paths (obtained via canonicalizePluginPath(String)) to HttpRpcPlugin instance.

      • validateHttpRpcPluginPath

        protected void validateHttpRpcPluginPath(String path)
        Ensure that the given path for an HttpRpcPlugin is valid. This method simply returns for valid inputs; throws and exception otherwise.
        参数:
        path - a request path, no query parameters, etc.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - on invalid paths.

      • canonicalizePluginPath

        protected String canonicalizePluginPath(String origPath)
        参数:
        origPath - a request path, no query parameters, etc.
        返回:
        a canonical representation of the input, with trailing and leading slashes removed.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given path is a root.

      • createAndInitialize

        protected <T> T createAndInitialize(String pluginClassName,
                                    Class<T> pluginClass)
        Helper method to load and initialize a given plugin class. This uses reflection because plugins share no common interfaces. (They could though!)
        参数:
        pluginClassName - the class name of the plugin to load
        pluginClass - class of the plugin
        返回:
        loaded an initialized instance of pluginClass

      • shutdown

        public com.stumbleupon.async.Deferred<ArrayList<Object>> shutdown()
        Called to gracefully shutdown the plugin. Implementations should close any IO they have open
        返回:
        A deferred object that indicates the completion of the request. The Object has not special meaning and can be null (think of it as Deferred<Void>).
